item.title: Mechanical spirits and spiritual machines
item.description: [under construction] Notes: A note about Doom Guy, the book A history of BeOS About Haiku A few anecdotes of older engineers Comparing modern SDEs to Civil Engineers Bloat in software AI, Crypto, etc. Books: In the beginning was the command line.
